General.Name: VBARE Iberian Properties SOCIMI SA
General.Description: VBARE Iberian Properties SOCIMI, S.A. is a multi-family residential REIT company. It provides renting and operating own or leased real estate properties. The company was formerly known as VBA Real Estate Investment Trust 3000, SOCIMI, S.A. and changed its name to VBARE Iberian Properties SOCIMI, S.A. in September 2016. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

2.Name: Mr. Inigo Sanchez del Campo Basagoiti
2.Title: Non Board Sec.
